name: PPG
description:
This is the Push Pull Game (PPG) test/demo! The game is now in testing and I am looking forward to hearing feedback that can assist me in the direction of future development for the game.

Soar through levels and make use of your Velocitator and Sydekick, they are your tools.

Use the Velocitator to push and pull yourself through the air, and use the Sydekick to break barriers blocking your way or shoot levers to open doors. 

Don't forget to collect the yellow orbs which contain ammo!

The are currently 6 levels in this demo, have fun!

Follow me on Twitter for more updates: @omogonix
